text: @SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe The PRESIDENT ACTED EARLY ON by stopping all flights from China while YOU WERE MINGLING IN CHINATOWN in peoples faces inviting the spread of the Coronavirus. You hypocrite don’t you fear the consequences of your deep hypocrisy in the eyes of God?
